name: Cambermast Work Hub
postStartCommand: sh -c 'if command -v tailscale >/dev/null 2>&1; then tailscale serve --tcp=5105 tcp://localhost:5105; else echo "tailscale CLI not found in container, skipping tailscale serve"; fi'
postAttachCommand: sh -c 'if ! lsof -i :5105 -t >/dev/null; then npm run dev; else echo "Dev server already running on port 5105"; fi'
